SELECT reserve.id,doctor.name doctorName,patient.name patientName, DATE_FORMAT(reserve.reserveTime, '%Y年%m月%d日 %H:%i') reserveTime, department.name departmentName,reserve.NumberReminders,reserve.state reserveState,patient.id patientId FROM reserve INNER JOIN doctorInformation doctor ON doctor.id=reserve.doctorId INNER JOIN patientInformation patient ON patient.id=reserve.patientId INNER JOIN department ON department.id=did WHERE 1=1
AND patient.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{patientName},'%')
AND reserve.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderId},'%')
AND doctor.id = #{doctorId} AND reserve.state!=0

SELECT OrderForm.id , DATE_FORMAT(operatingTime, '%Y年%m月%d日 %H:%i') operatingTime , general.value orderState , doctor.name doctorName , patientInformation.name patientName , department.name departmentName FROM OrderForm INNER JOIN reserve ON OrderForm.id = reserve.id AND doctorId = #{doctorId} INNER JOIN doctorInformation doctor ON doctor.id = reserve.doctorId INNER JOIN patientInformation ON patientInformation.id - reserve.patientId INNER JOIN general ON coding = OrderForm.state INNER JOIN department ON department.id = did WHERE OrderForm.id = #{reserveId} GROUP BY OrderForm.id
SELECT drug.id, cover, drugName, price, orderDrug.number * price totalPrice, orderDrug.number number FROM orderDrug INNER JOIN drug ON orderDrug.drugId = drug.id WHERE orderDrug.orderId = #{id}
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(reserveTime, '%H:%i') reserveTime FROM reserve WHERE DATEDIFF(#{date}, reserveTime) = 0 AND doctorId = #{doctorId}
SELECT TIME_FORMAT(startTime, '%H:%i') startTime, TIME_FORMAT(endTime, '%H:%i') endTime FROM doctorDuty INNER JOIN dutyTime ON dutyTime.id = doctorDuty.dutyId WHERE doctorDuty.id = #{id}
SELECT id FROM reserve WHERE DATE_FORMAT(#{reservetime}, '%Y年%m月%d日 %H:%i') = DATE_FORMAT(reserveTime, '%Y年%m月%d日 %H:%i') AND doctorId = #{doctorid}

SELECT reserve.id,doctor.name doctorName,patient.name patientName, DATE_FORMAT(reserve.reserveTime, '%Y年%m月%d日 %H:%i') reserveTime, department.name departmentName,reserve.NumberReminders,reserve.state reserveState,patient.id patientId FROM reserve INNER JOIN doctorInformation doctor ON doctor.id=reserve.doctorId INNER JOIN patientInformation patient ON patient.id=reserve.patientId INNER JOIN department ON department.id=did WHERE 1=1
AND patient.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{patientName},'%')
AND reserve.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderId},'%')
AND doctor.id='1' AND reserve.state=0

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM reserve WHERE state = 1 AND doctorId = #{doctorId}) overAppointmentNumber, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM reserve WHERE state = 2 AND doctorId = #{doctorId}) appointmentNumber, COUNT(id) allAppointmentNumber FROM reserve WHERE doctorId = #{doctorId}

SELECT patient.name patientName, patient.age patientAge, patient.identityNumber patientIdentityNumber, doctor.name doctorName, doctor.age doctorAge, general.value duty, department.name departmentName FROM patientInformation patient, doctorInformation doctor INNER JOIN doctorDuty ON doctorDuty.id = doctor.id INNER JOIN department ON did = department.id INNER JOIN general ON doctorDuty.dutyId = coding WHERE patient.id = #{patientid} AND doctor.id = #{doctorid}

SELECT reserve.id, patient.name patientName, doctor.name doctorName, orderGeneral.value orderState, OrderForm.orderPrice totalPrice, DATE_FORMAT(OrderForm.operatingTime, '%Y年%m月%d日 %H时%i分%s秒') operatingTime, DATE_FORMAT(reserve.reserveTime, '%Y年%m月%d日 %H时%i分') reserveTime, department.name departmentName, patient.identityNumber FROM reserve INNER JOIN OrderForm ON OrderForm.id = reserve.id AND OrderForm.state = 'GST03' INNER JOIN general orderGeneral ON OrderForm.state = orderGeneral.coding INNER JOIN doctorInformation doctor ON reserve.doctorId = doctor.id INNER JOIN department ON doctor.did = department.id INNER JOIN patientInformation patient ON patient.id = reserve.patientId WHERE OrderForm.id = #{orderId}

SELECT DISTINCT drug.cover, drug.drugName drugName, orderDrug.number, drug.price, drug.price * orderDrug.number totalPrice FROM drug, orderDrug WHERE (orderDrug.number, drug.id) IN (SELECT orderDrug.number, orderDrug.drugId FROM orderDrug WHERE orderDrug.orderId = #{orderId})

SELECT OrderForm.id orderId,doctor.name doctorName,patient.name patientName,OrderForm.orderPrice, DATE_FORMAT(OrderForm.operatingTime,'%Y年%m月%d日 %H时%i分%s秒') operatingTime,DATE_FORMAT(reserve.reserveTime,'%Y年%m月%d日 %H时%i分') reserveTime, general.value orderState FROM reserve INNER JOIN OrderForm ON (OrderForm.state='GST01' OR OrderForm.state='GST02') AND OrderForm.id=reserve.id INNER JOIN doctorInformation doctor ON reserve.doctorId=doctor.id INNER JOIN patientInformation patient ON reserve.patientId=patient.id INNER JOIN general ON OrderForm.state=coding WHERE 1=1
AND doctor.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{doctorName},'%')
AND reserve.state=1 AND reserve.patientId=#{patientId} GROUP BY OrderForm.id

SELECT reserve.id, patient.id patientId, patient.name patientName, doctor.name doctorName, orderGeneral.value orderState, OrderForm.orderPrice totalPrice, DATE_FORMAT(OrderForm.operatingTime, '%Y年%m月%d日 %H时%i分%s秒') operatingTime, DATE_FORMAT(reserve.reserveTime, '%Y年%m月%d日 %H时%i分') reserveTime, department.name departmentName, patient.identityNumber FROM reserve INNER JOIN OrderForm ON OrderForm.id = reserve.id AND OrderForm.state = 'GST01' INNER JOIN general orderGeneral ON OrderForm.state = orderGeneral.coding INNER JOIN doctorInformation doctor ON reserve.doctorId = doctor.id INNER JOIN department ON doctor.did = department.id INNER JOIN patientInformation patient ON patient.id = reserve.patientId WHERE OrderForm.id = #{orderId}

SELECT reserve.id orderId,doctor.name,doctor.avatar doctorAvatar,department.name departmentName ,DATE_FORMAT(reserve.reserveTime, '%Y年%m月%d日 %H时%i分') reserveTime,reserve.state FROM reserve INNER JOIN doctorInformation doctor ON reserve.doctorId=doctor.id INNER JOIN department ON doctor.did=department.id INNER JOIN patientInformation patient ON reserve.patientId=patient.id WHERE 1=1
AND doctor.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{doctorName},'%') AND reserve.patientId=#{patientId} ORDER BY reserve.state
